text: It wasn't only her stunning yellow suit of blazer and shorts that got Olivia Munn noticed at a celebrity event in Hollywood on Tuesday. The actress's pout also set tongues wagging. Munn, 37, appeared to sport much plumper lips as she posed for photos at the CFDA, Variety and WWD Runway to Red Carpet event luncheon at the Chateau Marmont. But it turns out it was just makeup that had given her a wider smile. Scroll down for video Pouty : Olivia Munn, 37, got noticed not just for her bright yellow outfit but also for her much fuller lips as she attended a celebrity luncheon in West Hollywood on Tuesday All for show : A few hours later, the actress posted video to Instagram having removed her'lus
